channel.title: Chronicles of Lemuria
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Chronicles of Lemuria

item.title: Lucian, the Pale Inquisitor
item.description: Summary In the ash-choked streets of Luthcheq, Lucian was a tool of the Karanoks.

item.title: Welcome to the Chronicles
item.description: Chronicles of Lemuria Welcome to the digital archive of our D&D campaigns. Here you will find the legends, lore, and statistics of our heroes.
